channel.title: [RESOLVED] Thanks to Dragonchain
channel.description:
How would I change what is written on the emote tabs? I've tried searching "yes" as that's how I often see it in sources, but I cant seem to be able to find it? Any help?
Many thanks,
Syrillia.

item.title: [RESOLVED] Thanks to Dragonchain
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Soz, I was adding it like this:

		update();
sendFrame126("@lre@Cape", 180);
}
	}

KK, works fine! Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED] Thanks to Dragonchain
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:7, topic:155107”]I have this;

		PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
        	PlayerHandler.updateNPC(this, outStream);
		resetItems(3214);
		resetBank();
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHat],1,playerHat);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape],1,playerCape);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerAmulet],1,playerAmulet);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],190,playerArrows);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerChest],1,playerChest);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerShield],1,playerShield);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerLegs],1,playerLegs);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHands],1,playerHands);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerFeet],1,playerFeet);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerRing],1,playerRing);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],1,playerWeapon);

		update();
	}

	public void update()
	{
		handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
		handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);

		flushOutStream();
	}

How would I add it?[/quote]

Add it right under update(); and before the }

Read full topic

just go into client.java find emote 168 or something and fill this out like dragon chain said

item.title: [RESOLVED] Thanks to Dragonchain
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

I have this;

		PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
        	PlayerHandler.updateNPC(this, outStream);
		resetItems(3214);
		resetBank();
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHat],1,playerHat);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape],1,playerCape);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerAmulet],1,playerAmulet);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],190,playerArrows);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerChest],1,playerChest);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerShield],1,playerShield);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerLegs],1,playerLegs);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHands],1,playerHands);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerFeet],1,playerFeet);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerRing],1,playerRing);
		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],1,playerWeapon);

		update();
	}

	public void update()
	{
		handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
		handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);

		flushOutStream();
	}

How would I add it?

item.title: [RESOLVED] Thanks to Dragonchain
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Oops sorry, in your client.java find:

update();

And under that add:

sendFrame126("@lre@Cape", 180); }
;D

item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Ok, in client.java find case 168: and in that case put

startAnimation(855);

before break;
